## Feature Description
What would you like to be implemented?

## Motivation
Why is this feature necessary? What problem does it solve?

## Proposed Solution
How do you envision this should work?

## Alternatives Considered
Are there other ways to solve this?

## Technical Impact
Does this feature require changes to APIs, database, etc.?

## Additional Context
Links, screenshots, examples from other projects.
